applications.name: This Website
description: Modular CSS implemented via the SMACSS pattern. Page scaffolding implemented via the Sass powered grid system Susy.
Also features a modern component-oriented project setup and an elaborate Gulp workflow deployment to generate a "browser ready" app state.

applications.name: Football Dream Team
description: Pick your Premier League football dream team amongst an array of players and submit to the database to compare with teams submitted by other users.
This project was a major part of my AngularJS learning process and I was keen to implement both framework fundamentals as well as established best practices.

applications.name: Shopping Basket
description: A code test for an interview, the task was to implement the specified shopping basket functionality as well as a responsive presentation layer.
Solution consisted of an MVC pattern with vanilla JavaScript, jQuery, and Handlebars.

applications.name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: A code test for an interview, the task was to implement this classic game in vanilla JavaScript. Play against the computer or spectate a computer vs computer game.
Source JavaScript code features a very simple controller and a model. Presentation styling implemented via the SMACSS pattern.
